Game

Class GameGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Game.GameGUI

  • public class GameGUI
extends javafx.application.Application

    Game GUI class

    The program is used to implement GUI for the grid.

      • GameGUI

        public GameGUI(java.lang.String _size,
               int _n,
               Player[] plist,
               int turn,
               GridStatus _grid)
        This constructor is used to initialize the grid of the game for undo and resume functionality.
        Parameters:
        _size - size of the grid.
        _n - number of players.
        plist - array containing players.
        turn - integer having the turn stored as a number.
        _grid - Object of the class of gridStatus which stores status of grid at any point of time.
